statements: SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM location_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE longitude BETWEEN -100 AND -90;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM location_data;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(speed) AS average_speed, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM location_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM location_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -75;
SELECT * FROM devices ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT device_name, location_lat, location_long FROM devices WHERE location_lat > 0 AND location_long < 0;
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_updated FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices JOIN data_logs ON devices.device_id = data_logs.device_id;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS num_logs FROM data_logs GROUP BY device_id HAVING num_logs > 100;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE location_lat > 30 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT device_name, location_lat, location_long FROM devices WHERE location_long < 0 ORDER BY device_id;

SELECT device_name, log_time, log_data FROM devices JOIN data_logs ON devices.device_id = data_logs.device_id WHERE devices.device_name LIKE 'device%' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM log_time) = 10 ORDER BY log_time;

SELECT device_id, device_name, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM devices JOIN data_logs ON devices.device_id = data_logs.device_id GROUP BY device_id, device_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY log_count DESC, device_name;

SELECT device_id, device_name, SUM(CAST(jsonb_extract_path_text(log_data,'reading') AS INT)) AS total_readings FROM devices JOIN data_logs ON devices.device_id = data_logs.device_id GROUP BY device_id, device_name HAVING total_readings > 1000 ORDER BY total_readings DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, status FROM devices WHERE device_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT device_name, status FROM devices WHERE status = 'inactive' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM device_locations WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, longitude, latitude, timestamp FROM device_locations WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM device_locations WHERE device_id = 2 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, status FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC, device_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, status FROM devices JOIN device_locations ON devices.device_id = device_locations.device_id;
SELECT geofence_id, name, ST_AsText(area_polygon) AS polygon FROM geofences;
SELECT * FROM location_data;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM device_details WHERE firmware_version = '2.0';
SELECT region_name, boundary FROM region_boundaries WHERE region_id = 5;
SELECT device_id, status FROM device_status WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM location_data WHERE device_id = 12345
SELECT * FROM device_status WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT MAX(latitude), MIN(longitude) FROM location_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM device_details WHERE firmware_version LIKE '%2.0%'
SELECT device_id, region_name, ST_Area(boundary) AS area FROM region_boundaries WHERE ST_Intersects(boundary, 'POINT(-73.987607 40.757007)')
SELECT * FROM device_locations;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM device_locations ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 50;
SELECT * FROM device_locations WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'smartphone';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY user_email DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT alert_message, timestamp FROM alerts WHERE device_id = 2 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
